channel.title: disks on Jesse Janzer
channel.description: Recent content in disks on Jesse Janzer

item.title: Cloning Windows Drives
item.description: TLDR Use clonezilla but don’t proportionally copy, do a 1-for-1 disk to disk copy Use gparted to move the partitions to the very end of the disk that follow after your C drive Boot into windows and use the disk management utility to expand the C drive The Problem I recently needed to migrate a drive from a 512GB SSD running windows 10 to a larger 2TB drive. I’ve done this in the past plenty of times with Clonezilla but I ran into a problem this time.
